Women in Engineering Programs     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Women in Engineering Programs      Women in Engineering Programs   Google Translate        Main Menu    About           Prospective Students    Undergraduate and Graduate Student Resources         Student Organizations           Society of Women Engineers (SWE)    Women in Computer Science (WiCS)         K-12 Programs           Girls Who Code at UIC Club    Introduce a Girl to Engineering Day    Women in Engineering Summer Program (WIESP)         Staff    Support WIEP     Eyebrow menu    UIC Engineering    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Women in Engineering Programs    K-12 Programs    Girls Who Code at UIC Club        Girls Who Code at UIC Club  BECOME A GIRLS WHO CODE AT UIC CLUB CLUB MEMBER!  Girls Who Code at UIC Club is a FREE year-round program for 9th-12th grade students in the Chicago-land area who are interested in exploring computer science! Girls Who Code , is a non-profit organization that works to inspire, educate, and equip students with computing skills to pursue 21st century opportunities.        Become a Member      WHEN IS IT?  2019-2020 Program Dates:  September 28, 2019 â€“ April 25, 2020  We meet every Saturday, from 10am-12pm, a  final schedule of meetings will be provided to participants at a later time.    WHAT ARE THE REQUIREMENTS?  Students must be in 9th-12th grade (or returning participants) and commit to attending all meetings.    IS CODING EXPERIENCE REQUIRED?  Absolutely not! Our Club is open to beginners who do not have any coding or programming experience. In fact, our club consists of 4 different levels to accommodate everyone with or without experience:  Beginner Level covers Scratch and Python  Intermediate Level covers Java Script and Web Development  Advanced Level I and Advanced  Level II work on the development of applications and hardware projects using programming             WANT TO JOIN OUR CLUB?  To join, you must apply for admission. Application to our 2020-2021 program will open in April 2020!   APPLY HERE!         Program Location   PROGRAM LOCATION  University of Illinois at Chicago Engineering Research Facility 842 West Taylor Street Chicago, IL 60607          Thanks to our sponsors   Girls Who Code at UIC is proudly sponsored by UIC Engineering and the following units:   Thank you for your support!
